text: Richard Ferrand (born 1 July 1962) is a French politician of La République En Marche! (LREM). He has been the President of the National Assembly since 2018. He has been the member of the National Assembly for Finistère's 6th constituency since 2012. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the National Assembly (France) Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:People from Aveyron
title: Richard Ferrand
